original_text: “You came down on Mount Sinai; you spoke to them from heaven. You gave them regulations and laws that are just and right, and decrees and commands that are good.
korean_text: 또 시내 산에 강림하시고 하늘에서부터 그들과 말씀하사 정직한 규례와 진정한 율법과 선한 율례와 계명을 그들에게 주시고

sentences.original_text: You came down on Mount Sinai
you spoke to them from heaven
You gave them regulations and laws
and decrees and commands that are good
